WRITING.TEXT:
Depends what side of Nashville you're on. Game Keep in Hermitage is where most gamers go, but Roll the Dice in Murfreesboro also does Adventurer's League.
Both are active, but Roll the Dice has a much nicer environment.

WRITING.TITLE: What's the most productive way to engage in political discussion among friends and family?

WRITING.TEXT: How does this work? Someone starts a town, friends you, and keeps their DS on 24/7?

I **just** heard some Sims 3 Medieval music on an episode of Ladies of London last night! I don't follow the show, so all I can say is they were having some garden tea party at a small table, and suddenly I heard the violins.
